description: As a restaurant customer, I want to view available tables for a specific date and time, so that I can see my dining options at a glance
As a restaurant customer, I want to specify the size of my party when booking, so that I can be assigned an appropriately sized table
As a restaurant customer, I want to select a specific time slot for my reservation, so that I can dine at my preferred time
As a restaurant customer, I want to view a calendar interface for selecting dates, so that I can easily navigate to my desired reservation date
As a restaurant customer, I want to receive immediate confirmation of my reservation, so that I know my booking was successful
As a restaurant customer, I want to modify or cancel my existing reservation, so that I can adjust my plans if needed
As a restaurant customer, I want to see a visual indicator of table availability (e.g., green/red), so that I can quickly identify available time slots
As a restaurant customer, I want to receive an email confirmation of my reservation, so that I have a record of my booking
As a restaurant customer, I want to add special requests or notes to my reservation, so that the restaurant can accommodate my specific needs
As a restaurant customer, I want to view the restaurant's booking policy and cancellation terms, so that I understand the reservation rules
As a host, I want to see a real-time visual layout of all restaurant tables with their current status (occupied, reserved, available), so that I can quickly understand the dining room situation.
As a server, I want to update table status (seated, ordered, paid) with a single click, so that all staff members have accurate information about table progress.
As a host, I want to assign walk-in customers to available tables based on party size, so that I can efficiently accommodate guests without reservations.
As a manager, I want to view current occupancy rates and table turnover metrics, so that I can optimize seating arrangements and staffing levels.
As a host, I want to see estimated wait times for occupied tables, so that I can provide accurate wait time estimates to waiting customers.
As a server, I want to receive notifications when my assigned tables' status changes, so that I can provide timely service to my customers.
As a manager, I want to view historical table usage patterns, so that I can make informed decisions about table arrangements and staffing schedules.
As a host, I want to mark tables as unavailable for maintenance or special events, so that these tables won't be included in available seating options.
As a server, I want to add notes to specific tables (such as dietary restrictions or special occasions), so that all staff can provide better customized service.
As a restaurant manager, I want to set up and modify time slots for reservations, so that I can control when customers can book tables
As an administrator, I want to configure table layouts and seating arrangements, so that the system accurately reflects our restaurant's physical setup
As a host, I want to modify existing reservations (date, time, party size), so that I can accommodate customer requests for changes
As a manager, I want to set up reservation policies (minimum/maximum party size, advance booking window), so that I can enforce our business rules
As a host, I want to cancel reservations and automatically notify affected customers, so that I can manage unexpected changes efficiently
As a host, I want to add customers to a waiting list when desired times are fully booked, so that I can fill cancellations and maximize table utilization
As a manager, I want to view and manage the waiting list, so that I can make informed decisions about special accommodations
As an administrator, I want to set up automatic waiting list notifications, so that customers can be informed when a table becomes available
As a manager, I want to generate reports on reservation patterns and cancellation rates, so that I can optimize our booking policies
As an administrator, I want to configure booking blackout dates and special hours, so that I can manage reservations during holidays or special events
As a restaurant manager, I want to set up my restaurant's table inventory with details like table numbers, capacity, and sections, so that the system has accurate table data to manage
As a host/hostess, I want to see real-time table availability status, so that I can quickly identify which tables are available for seating guests
As a server, I want to mark tables as occupied, available, or in cleanup status, so that the system maintains accurate real-time availability information
As a booking system, I want to handle multiple concurrent reservation requests for the same time slot, so that double-bookings are prevented
As a restaurant manager, I want to set table turn-time estimates for different meal periods, so that the system can accurately predict future table availability
As a host/hostess, I want the system to automatically resolve conflicts when multiple staff members try to seat different parties at the same table, so that double-seating is prevented
As a restaurant manager, I want to view historical table utilization data, so that I can optimize table assignments and seating arrangements
As a booking system, I want to optimize table assignments based on party size and available tables, so that we maximize seating efficiency
As a server, I want to receive notifications when my tables' status needs to be updated, so that availability information stays current and accurate
As a restaurant manager, I want to set custom rules for table combinations and splitting, so that the system can accurately represent flexible seating arrangements
As a customer, I want to receive an immediate email confirmation when my reservation is confirmed, so that I have written proof of my booking
As a customer, I want to receive SMS notifications about changes to my reservation status, so that I'm immediately aware of any updates
As a customer, I want to receive reminder notifications 24 hours before my reservation, so that I don't forget my booking
As a customer, I want to be able to choose my preferred communication method (email or SMS), so that I receive notifications in the way that works best for me
As a customer, I want to receive notifications when I move up on the wait list, so that I know my current position and status
As a system administrator, I want to be able to configure notification templates, so that I can maintain consistent and professional communication with customers
As a system administrator, I want to view delivery status of notifications, so that I can ensure customers are receiving their communications
As a customer, I want to be able to unsubscribe from notifications, so that I can control what communications I receive
As a system administrator, I want to schedule automated reminder notifications, so that customers are consistently notified about their upcoming reservations
As a customer service representative, I want to see a history of all notifications sent to a customer, so that I can better assist with any communication-related inquiries
As a restaurant manager, I want to add new menu items with descriptions, prices, and images, so that I can keep the digital menu up to date with our offerings
As a kitchen staff member, I want to mark menu items as unavailable in real-time, so that customers don't order items we can't prepare
As a restaurant manager, I want to create and schedule seasonal menus in advance, so that menu changes can be automatically applied at specific dates
As a server, I want to quickly add or remove daily specials, so that customers can see current promotional items
As a restaurant manager, I want to update item prices across multiple menu categories, so that I can efficiently manage pricing changes
As a nutritionist, I want to add and update dietary information for menu items, so that customers can make informed choices about their meals
As a restaurant manager, I want to categorize menu items and arrange their display order, so that customers can easily navigate our menu
As a server, I want to view the revision history of menu changes, so that I can track when items or prices were last updated
As a restaurant manager, I want to export menu data in different formats, so that I can use it for printing or marketing purposes
As a restaurant manager, I want to clone and modify existing menu items, so that I can quickly create variations of popular dishes
As a host/hostess, I want to assign customers to specific tables, so that I can manage seating and track order locations efficiently
As a server, I want to create new orders for specific tables, so that I can begin the order fulfillment process for my customers
As a server, I want to modify existing orders by adding, removing, or updating items, so that I can accommodate customer requests and corrections
As a server, I want to add special instructions or dietary requirements to individual items, so that I can communicate specific customer needs to the kitchen
As a kitchen staff member, I want to view incoming orders on a kitchen display system, so that I can prepare meals efficiently and in the correct order
As a kitchen staff member, I want to mark orders as 'in preparation' and 'completed', so that servers know when to pick up and deliver orders
As a server, I want to split bills for a table, so that I can accommodate separate payment requests from customers
As a manager, I want to view real-time table status and order progress, so that I can monitor service efficiency and restaurant operations
As a server, I want to process different payment methods for orders, so that I can complete transactions according to customer preferences
As a server, I want to void or comp items with manager approval, so that I can handle customer complaints and special situations appropriately
As a customer, I want to browse the complete menu with categories and items, so that I can see all available food options
As a customer, I want to customize ingredients and portions for menu items, so that my order matches my preferences
As a customer, I want to select between pickup and delivery options, so that I can choose how to receive my order
As a customer, I want to save my delivery addresses, so that I don't have to re-enter them for future orders
As a customer, I want to view my order history, so that I can easily reorder my favorite items
As a customer, I want to save my favorite orders and customizations, so that I can quickly place repeat orders
As a customer, I want to receive real-time updates on my order status, so that I know when it will be ready
As a customer, I want to securely save my payment information, so that I can check out faster in the future
As a customer, I want to rate and review my past orders, so that I can provide feedback on my experience
As a customer, I want to easily search and filter menu items by dietary preferences, so that I can find suitable options quickly
As a customer, I want to view the real-time status of my current order, so that I know when my food will be ready
As a kitchen staff member, I want to update the status of orders (received, preparing, ready), so that customers and other staff are informed of progress
As a customer, I want to receive notifications when my order status changes, so that I stay informed without constantly checking the app
As a restaurant manager, I want to view the status of all active orders in real-time, so that I can manage kitchen operations efficiently
As a delivery driver, I want to see orders that are ready for pickup, so that I can efficiently collect and deliver them
As a system administrator, I want to configure status update triggers and notification rules, so that the right people receive the right updates at the right time
As a customer service representative, I want to access order status history, so that I can assist customers with their inquiries
As a customer, I want to view the estimated completion time for my order, so that I can plan my pickup or delivery time accordingly
As a kitchen staff member, I want to see how long each order has been in its current status, so that I can prioritize orders effectively
As a system administrator, I want to access tracking system analytics and metrics, so that I can monitor system performance and identify areas for improvement
As a kitchen manager, I want to view all incoming orders in real-time, so that I can maintain awareness of upcoming preparation needs
As a chef, I want to see orders organized by preparation station (grill, salad, fryer, etc.), so that I can efficiently manage my station's workload
As a line cook, I want to mark items as 'in preparation' and 'completed', so that other kitchen staff know the status of each order
As a kitchen manager, I want to set preparation priority levels for orders, so that we can handle VIP customers, dietary restrictions, or urgent requests appropriately
As a chef, I want to see estimated preparation times for each dish, so that I can coordinate timing across multiple orders
As a kitchen manager, I want to receive alerts for orders that are taking longer than expected, so that I can investigate and address delays
As a line cook, I want to see a countdown timer for each item I'm preparing, so that I can ensure dishes are completed on time
As a kitchen manager, I want to view historical order completion times, so that I can optimize kitchen performance and staffing
As a chef, I want to be able to communicate special instructions or modifications across stations, so that all requirements are met accurately
As a kitchen manager, I want to generate reports on station efficiency and timing, so that I can identify areas for improvement
As a manager, I want to create and edit staff schedules using a drag-and-drop calendar interface, so that I can efficiently plan work shifts.
As a manager, I want to view conflicts when scheduling shifts, so that I can avoid double-booking staff or creating overlapping shifts.
As a manager, I want to set staff skills and qualifications, so that I can ensure appropriate coverage for each shift.
As a staff member, I want to input my availability preferences, so that managers can consider them when creating schedules.
As a manager, I want to publish finalized schedules to all staff members, so that everyone knows when they are working.
As a staff member, I want to receive notifications when the schedule is published or updated, so that I'm aware of my upcoming shifts.
As a manager, I want to view staff availability and time-off requests in the calendar, so that I can make informed scheduling decisions.
As a manager, I want to create recurring shift patterns, so that I can quickly generate schedules for multiple weeks.
As a manager, I want to track total scheduled hours per employee, so that I can maintain appropriate work distributions and avoid overtime.
As a staff member, I want to view my scheduled shifts on a mobile-friendly interface, so that I can check my schedule from anywhere.
As a manager, I want to export schedule data to common formats (PDF, Excel), so that I can use the information in other systems or print schedules.
As a manager, I want to set minimum staffing requirements for different shifts, so that I can ensure adequate coverage at all times.
As an employee, I want to create and edit my professional profile, so that I can keep my information up to date in the system
As an employee, I want to upload and update my certifications with expiration dates, so that my qualifications are properly tracked and maintained
As an HR manager, I want to view and verify employee certifications, so that I can ensure compliance with role requirements
As an employee, I want to specify my skill sets and expertise levels, so that my capabilities are accurately represented
As a team leader, I want to search for employees based on specific skills and certifications, so that I can find suitable team members for projects
As an employee, I want to set my availability preferences and working hours, so that managers can consider my schedule when making assignments
As an HR manager, I want to generate reports on staff qualifications and certifications, so that I can identify training needs and compliance requirements
As a department manager, I want to view role assignments and skill distribution within my team, so that I can identify gaps and plan resource allocation
As an employee, I want to receive notifications when my certifications are approaching expiration, so that I can take timely action to renew them
As an HR manager, I want to maintain historical records of employee roles and qualifications, so that I can track professional development over time
As a shift manager, I want to view real-time staff coverage levels on a dashboard, so that I can quickly identify current staffing status across all departments
As a department supervisor, I want to receive immediate alerts for understaffed periods, so that I can take prompt action to address staffing gaps
As a workforce planner, I want to see predicted staffing requirements based on historical data, so that I can optimize future staff scheduling
As a HR manager, I want to view historical coverage patterns and trends, so that I can make informed decisions about hiring needs
As a shift manager, I want to visualize coverage gaps in an intuitive timeline view, so that I can easily identify and address scheduling conflicts
As an operations manager, I want to compare actual staffing levels against business requirements, so that I can ensure optimal resource allocation
As a department supervisor, I want to export coverage analytics reports, so that I can share insights with stakeholders and create documentation
As a workforce planner, I want to set custom staffing level thresholds, so that I can define appropriate coverage requirements for different shifts and departments
As a HR manager, I want to access predictive analytics for seasonal staffing needs, so that I can plan recruitment efforts in advance
As an operations manager, I want to customize the dashboard view based on my department's specific needs, so that I can focus on relevant metrics
As an employee, I want to submit a time-off request with specific dates and type (vacation, sick leave, personal), so that I can formally request time away from work
As a manager, I want to review and approve/deny time-off requests from my team members, so that I can maintain appropriate staffing levels
As an employee, I want to view my remaining time-off balance by category (vacation, sick leave, etc.), so that I can plan my time off accordingly
As a manager, I want to view a calendar showing all approved time-off requests for my team, so that I can manage team coverage effectively
As an employee, I want to receive automatic notifications about the status of my time-off requests, so that I can plan accordingly
As an HR administrator, I want to configure time-off policies and approval workflows, so that the system enforces company policies correctly
As a manager, I want to delegate my approval authority when I'm away, so that time-off requests can be processed in my absence
As an employee, I want to cancel or modify a pending time-off request, so that I can adjust my plans if needed
As a manager, I want to receive alerts when multiple team members request the same days off, so that I can prevent understaffing
As an HR administrator, I want to generate reports on time-off usage and patterns, so that I can analyze leave trends and plan accordingly
As an employee, I want to set up automatic out-of-office notifications when my time-off is approved, so that colleagues are informed of my absence
As a team manager, I want to define and create custom roles with required skills and responsibilities, so that I can establish clear position requirements.
As a HR manager, I want to view and match employee skill profiles with role requirements, so that I can make data-driven staffing decisions.
As a team lead, I want to assign staff members to specific roles based on their skills and availability, so that I can optimize team composition.
As a resource manager, I want to set up role rotation schedules, so that team members can gain diverse experience while maintaining operational consistency.
As a team member, I want to view my current role assignments and upcoming rotations, so that I can prepare for transitions effectively.
As a manager, I want to monitor workload distribution across team members, so that I can prevent burnout and ensure balanced assignments.
As an employee, I want to update my skills and preferences profile, so that I can be matched with appropriate role opportunities.
As a project manager, I want to receive notifications about upcoming role rotations, so that I can plan for knowledge transfer and training.
As a team lead, I want to track skill gaps in my team, so that I can plan training or recruitment to meet role requirements.
As a HR manager, I want to generate reports on role assignments and rotations, so that I can analyze staffing patterns and improve resource allocation.
As a customer, I want to browse a visually appealing digital menu with food images, so that I can see what the dishes look like before ordering
As a customer, I want to filter menu items by dietary restrictions (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free), so that I can quickly find suitable options for my needs
As a customer, I want to see real-time availability of menu items, so that I don't try to order something that's out of stock

As a restaurant manager, I want to highlight daily specials and promotional items, so that I can drive sales of specific menu items
As a customer, I want to save my favorite menu items for quick access on future visits, so that I can easily reorder preferred dishes

As a customer, I want to modify my reservation date, time, or party size, so that I can adjust my plans when needed

As a customer, I want to receive reminder notifications before my reservation, so that I don't forget my booking
As a customer, I want to specify special requests or dietary requirements with my reservation, so that the restaurant can accommodate my needs

As a restaurant manager, I want to access reservation analytics and reports, so that I can optimize table availability and staffing
As a customer, I want to join a waitlist when my desired time slot is unavailable, so that I can be notified if a table becomes available

As a customer, I want to view the estimated preparation time for my order, so that I can plan accordingly
As a customer, I want to see the delivery progress on a map, so that I can track my order's physical location
As a customer, I want to receive real-time notifications when my order status changes, so that I stay informed without checking the dashboard
As a customer, I want to view my order details including items, quantities, and prices while tracking, so that I can verify my order information
As a customer, I want to see the delivery driver's estimated arrival time, so that I can be ready to receive my order

As a customer, I want to view my order history with past tracking details, so that I can reference previous orders and their delivery performance
As a customer, I want the tracking interface to be mobile-responsive, so that I can monitor my order from any device
As a customer, I want to share my order tracking link with others, so that they can also monitor the order progress

As a customer, I want to log in to my account using secure authentication, so that I can access my personal information

As a customer, I want to view my complete order history, so that I can track all my past purchases
As a customer, I want to save products to my favorites list, so that I can quickly find and purchase them later

As a customer, I want to view the details of individual past orders, so that I can review what I purchased and when

As a customer, I want to enable two-factor authentication, so that I can add an extra layer of security to my account
As a customer, I want to manage my communication preferences, so that I can control what notifications and updates I receive
As a customer, I want to delete my account and associated data, so that I can remove my information from the system if needed
